CustomField.description: The value that qualifies this icon to be shown on the specified record. Can be literal or based on a system variable. See examples in quotations, i.e. Credit_Decision__c = "Rejected", Credit_Check_Date__c Greater Than "180 days", etc. Note, do not include the quotations, only the value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The value that qualifies this icon to be shown on the specified record. Can be literal or based on a system variable. See examples in quotations, i.e. Credit_Decision__c = "Rejected", Credit_Check_Date__c Greater Than "180 days", etc. Note, do not include the quotations, only the value.
CustomField.label: Qualifying Value
